articles.title: Once-in-a-lifetime star 'explosion' set to light up the sky could happen any moment from now - LADbible
articles.description: The 'once-in-a-lifetime' nova explosion could happen at any moment
articles.content:
Hopefully the explosion doesn't happen before this article gets published otherwise my copy is ruined.
Aside from that, stargazers across the world could quite possibly witness a 'once-in-a-lifetime… [+2332 chars]
